CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Occurrence_Type__c, 'Scheduled') || ISPICKVAL(Occurrence_Type__c, 'Scheduled On-Call'), CASE(Frequency__c, 'Daily', ('Scheduled'+','+'Every'+' '+ Occurs__c +'Day(s)'), 'Weekly', ('Scheduled'+','+'Every'+' '+ Occurs__c+'Week(s)'+'('+ (IF( CONTAINS( Core_Schedule__c, 'S') ,'Sun,','')+ IF(CONTAINS( Core_Schedule__c, 'M'),'Mon,','')+ IF(CONTAINS( Core_Schedule__c, 'T'),'Tue,','')+ IF(CONTAINS( Core_Schedule__c, 'W'),'Wed,','')+ IF(CONTAINS( Core_Schedule__c, 'R'),'Thur,','')+ IF(CONTAINS( Core_Schedule__c, 'F'),'Fri,','')+ IF(CONTAINS( Core_Schedule__c, 'SA'),'Sat',''))+')'), 'Monthly', ('Scheduled'+','+ Occurs__c+'x/Month'), 'Year', ('Scheduled'+','+ Occurs__c+'x/Year'),NULL) , IF(ISPICKVAL(Occurrence_Type__c, 'On-Call'), 'On-Call', NULL) )
CustomField.label: Occurrence Type Formula
